solution_line_template: Four sets of earrings is {earrings_per_set}*{sets_of_earrings}=<<{earrings_per_set}*{sets_of_earrings}={total_earrings}>>{total_earrings} earrings.
Since for one earring, she uses two magnets, for eight earrings she uses {magnets_per_earring}*{total_earrings}=<<{magnets_per_earring}*{total_earrings}={total_magnets}>>{total_magnets} magnets.
Since she uses half as many buttons as magnets, then for {total_earrings} earrings she would use {total_magnets}/{half_divisor}={total_buttons} buttons.

Since she uses three times as many gemstones as buttons, then in {total_earrings} earrings, she will use {total_buttons}*{gemstones_multiplier}=<<{total_gemstones}={total_gemstones}>>{total_gemstones} gemstones.
